Loading... Movoto Real Estate » Washington » Bremerton » 728 Park Dr Prev | Next Back to Search 728 Park Dr, Bremerton, WA 98337 Courtesy of Coldwell Banker Park Shore RE
Price: $129,000 Loan Payment: $449/mo Bedrooms: 2 Bathrooms: 1 Size: 1,461 sqft $/Sqft: $88/sqft Type: Single Family House Year Built: - Lot Size: 4,356 Days on Movoto: 437 days Neighborhood: Bremerton MLS#: 215776 Status: Sold Go See This Home Make an Offer Adorable Craftsman style home on a private street across from Evergreen Park on Bremerton with waterfront access, close to college, PSNS and Bremerton Ferry. 1 story home with alley access to single car garage. Special features include updated kitchen, slate entry&fireplace, cyclone fencing and some updated electrical&plumbing. It will never be boring living next door to one of Bremerton's favorite parks and picnic areas. 1900 ft of shoreline, boat launch and spring&summer events.
